thread.title: Clatskanie mayor's husband pleads not guilty to public indecency
thread.title_full: Clatskanie mayor's husband pleads not guilty to public indecency | OregonLive.com

author: The Associated Press
title: Clatskanie mayor's husband pleads not guilty to public indecency
text:
Raymond Pohl Columbia County Sheriff's Office CLATSKANIE — The 64-year-old husband of the Clatskanie mayor has pleaded not guilty to 30 counts of public indecency.
Raymond S. Pohl pleaded not guilty Monday in Columbia County Circuit Court to charges that he exposed his genitals repeatedly to a woman who works at a drive-thru coffee stand .
MORE: What happens in Clatskanie -- allegations of racism, sextortion -- no longer stays in Clatskanie
Court documents say the incidents occurred at least twice a week for nearly two years until September 2015. Police say the victim told them the incidents were unsolicited and unwanted and that she feared retribution.
Pohl is the husband of Mayor Diane Pohl. KGW-TV reports he has resigned from the city's planning commission.
Pohl has posted bail and has another court appearance set for March.
Clatskanie is 60 miles northwest of Portland.
-- The Associated Press
